name: simlin
description: The web frontend and backend service for simlin

scripts.tsc: pnpm --filter @simlin/core exec tsc --noEmit && pnpm --filter @simlin/diagram exec tsc --noEmit && pnpm --filter @simlin/server exec tsc --noEmit && pnpm --filter @simlin/app exec tsc --noEmit
scripts.rebuild-stdlib: cargo build && for input in stdlib/*.stmx; do model="$(basename $input | cut -d '.' -f 1)"; target/debug/simlin convert --model-only "$input" --output src/simlin-engine/src/stdlib/"$model".pb; done
scripts.deploy: export NODE_ENV=production && pnpm clean && pnpm build && pnpm --filter @simlin/app deploy && gcloud app deploy ./.app.prod.yaml && pnpm --filter @simlin/app deploy-clean
scripts.test: pnpm --filter @simlin/core test && pnpm --filter @simlin/diagram test && pnpm --filter @simlin/engine test && pnpm --filter @simlin/app test && pnpm --filter @simlin/server test
